description: Example identity mapping file for cross-tenant translation
notes: All IDs should be Azure AD object IDs (GUIDs)
Use 'az ad user show --id user@domain.com --query id' to get user object IDs
Use 'az ad group show --group GroupName --query id' to get group object IDs
Use 'az ad sp show --id app-id --query id' to get service principal object IDs
If a mapping is missing and --strict-translation is NOT used, a placeholder will be generated
